name: Pong Juggle
description:
Juggle a ball by using 5 paddles.

CONTROLS:

    Left click: Rotate the middle paddle counterclockwise

    Right click: Rotate the middle paddle clockwise

    A / Left Arrow: Move the top and bottom paddle to the left

    D / Right Arrow: Move the top and bottom paddle to the right

    W / Up Arrow: Move the left and right paddle up

    S / Down Arrow: Move the left and right paddle down

(Due note that when the ball hits a paddle from behind, nothing happens)
